text: Clarence J. "Bud" Brown Jr. (June 18, 1927 - January 26, 2022) was an American publisher and politician."Brown Publishing files for bankruptcy" , Business Record, 3 May 2010 He was a Republican United States Representative from the 7th District of Ohio, serving from 1965 to 1983. Appointed by President Ronald Reagan, he also served as the United States Deputy Secretary of Commerce and Acting Secretary of Commerce, in total from 1983 to 1988. He was the father of actor Clancy Brown.Clancy Brown profile, FilmReference.com; accessed March 26, 2015.
